title: PHP Fatal error: Call to undefined function phpunit_mockobject_autoload()
body:
PHPUnit 3.6.12, MockObjects 1.2.1

Recent changes seem to have broken mock objects.  Here is the stack trace from my Hudson build which has been working fine up until yesterday afternoon.

PHP Fatal error:  Call to undefined function phpunit_mockobject_autoload() in /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/Util/GlobalState.php on line 378
PHP Stack trace:
PHP   1. {main}() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/bin/phpunit:0
PHP   2. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command::main() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/bin/phpunit:46
PHP   3. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->run() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:130
PHP   4. PHPUnit_TextUI_TestRunner->doRun() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:192
PHP   5. PHPUnit_Framework_TestSuite->run() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/TextUI/TestRunner.php:325
PHP   6. PHPUnit_Framework_TestSuite->run() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestSuite.php:705
PHP   7. PHPUnit_Framework_TestSuite->run() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestSuite.php:705
PHP   8. PHPUnit_Framework_TestSuite->run() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestSuite.php:705
PHP   9. PHPUnit_Framework_TestSuite->runTest() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestSuite.php:745
PHP  10. PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase->run() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestSuite.php:772
PHP  11. PHPUnit_Framework_TestResult->run() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestCase.php:751
PHP  12. PHPUnit_Framework_TestResult->addFailure() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php:699
PHP  13. PHPUnit_Util_Log_JUnit->addFailure() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php:308
PHP  14. PHPUnit_Util_Filter::getFilteredStacktrace() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/Util/Log/JUnit.php:210
PHP  15. PHPUnit_Util_GlobalState::phpunitFiles() /var/lib/hudson/jobs/MyProject/workspace/vendor/pear-pear.phpunit.de/PHPUnit/PHPUnit/Util/Filter.php:70
